alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and southeastern Sarasota Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 448 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Port Charlotte to near North Port. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Port Charlotte, Murdock, Lake Suzy, South Venice, Nokomis, El Jobean, Laurel, Venice Gardens, Warm Mineral Springs, Oscar Scherer State Park and Osprey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Sarasota
